name: Foreclosure Prevention
description: Falling behind on your mortgage or property taxes means risking foreclosure— the legal process that forces the sale of your home to cover a debt. In some cases, a lender can foreclose without going to court. Every year, seniors, and individuals with disabilities in San Francisco lose their most valuable asset, their home due to preventable foreclosures.
